entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
